titles.title: To provide for the conveyance of certain National Forest System lands to the towns of Laona and Wabeno, Wisconsin.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition and Forestry.

committee.subcommittee: Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition, and Forestry
committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: 6/24/2003--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain National Forest System lands to the towns of Laona and Wabeno, Wisconsin.
